original_text: So do not have trouble in your mind about what might happen tomorrow. Tomorrow will have its own problems. It is enough for you to be thinking each day about the problems of that day.’
korean_text: 그러므로 내일 일을 위하여 염려하지 말라 내일 일은 내일이 염려할 것이요 한 날의 괴로움은 그 날로 족하니라

sentences.original_text: So do not have trouble in your mind
Tomorrow will have its own problems
about the problems of that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날의 문제에 대해 생각하는 것으로 충분하다
